owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

encrypted_value.description: Value for your secret, encrypted with [LibSodium](https://libsodium.gitbook.io/doc/bindings_for_other_languages) using the public key retrieved from the [Get a repository public key](https://docs.github.com/rest/dependabot/secrets#get-a-repository-public-key) endpoint.

key_id.description: ID of the key you used to encrypt the secret.
